name: Hololens2
object_recognition: yes. Object Recognition. Azure Custom Vision https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/mixed-reality/mr-azure-310
voice_recognition:
yes. Support Windows Cortana
note: can work in noisy industrial environments
show_2d_content: yes. Can display 2D windows for some traditional apps

name: MagicLeap1
video_streaming: yes. With the device stream functionality, you can stream.
cloud_spatial_anchor: yes. spatial anchors are also shareable

name: NrealLight
cross_compatibility: yes. can be connected to a variety of andriod phones or nreal computing unit
audio_calling: yes. "Nreal glasses are now compatible with Android native apps, which means as long as the app is installed on the devices, users can view all app activity through their glasses."
cloud_spatial_anchor: yes. can be created on nreal with unity + azure

name: Epson_Moverio_BT300
object_recognition: yes. Object Recognition & Tracking Wikitude SDK SLAM. https://www.wikitude.com/external/doc/documentation/latest/epson/objecttracking.html#object-and-scene-recognition
cloud_spatial_anchor: yes. can be created using Wikitude Augmented Reality SDK for Epson Moverio Smart Glasses

name: Rokid_Project_Aurora
object_recognition: yes. Detection and tracking not recognition. note: once the LightForm scans something, it can realign projection if it was moved.
cross_compatibility: yes. USB-c connection to nintendo switch, android, ios, ipad pro

name: Tesseract_Holoboard_Premium_Edition
cross_compatibility: yes. any smarphone + holoboard HDK app

name: Mira_Prism
dof_6: possible. If using Wikitude SDK + attach to advanced phones

name: Google_Glass_Enterprise_Edition_2
object_recognition: yes. support for computer vision and advanced machine learning capabilities so developer might be able to develop this capabilities. for more details please contact Google
cloud_spatial_anchor: yes. but not sure through cloud. Support for users collaborating in real time

name: Everysight_Raptor
hand_controls: yes. Multi-Touch pad for use with or without gloves

name: Toshiba_DynaEdge_AR100
lighting_estimation: yes. (Built-in Ambient Light Sensor (ALS) to sense the amount of ambient light present, and appropriately dim the device's screen to match it)
hand_controls: yes. Touch pad + controller(the computing unit itself)
show_2d_content: yes. (one can pull up docs like pdf for side assistance)

name: Varjo_XR1
hand_controls: yes. Uses HTV Vive or SteamVR controllers

name: Lightform
cross_compatibility: yes. can work with most projectors
